wikipedia_page.main: Alfred Charles Crowle (surname rhymes with as owl) was Technical Director to Selección de fútbol de México (Mexico national football team). Born in Mexico, he was the son of tin miner Alfred Crowle (born in St. Blazey Gate, Cornwall) and Eugenia Augusta Leonora Shaw.In 1935 he led Mexico to their first international competition trophy win, the football tournament at the Central American and Caribbean Games tournament.
